root.name: Grand Theft Auto: London 1969
root.description: Grand Theft Auto: London 1969 is the second game in the Grand Theft Auto series. Set in London, the game uses the same graphics and gameplay as in the first Grand Theft Auto. It is considered more of an expansion to the original as it comes with 32 new missions and 30 new vehicles. The game uses the London theme, with Cockney accents and phrases. Some of the phrases are "You're nicked", meaning under arrest, and "You're brown bread", Cockney rhyming slang for "You're dead."As it uses the same gameplay system, you will receiving missions and upon completing the mission you recieve a large sum of cash.
